headline.main: China Holds Live-Fire Navy Drills in East China Sea
headline.print_headline: China Holds Live-Fire Navy Drills in East China Sea

docs.snippet: China's navy has fired dozens of missiles and torpedoes during exercises in the East China Sea that come amid heightened maritime tensions in the region, underscoring Beijing's determination to back up its sovereignty claims with force if needed....
docs.lead_paragraph: China's navy has fired dozens of missiles and torpedoes during exercises in the East China Sea that come amid heightened maritime tensions in the region, underscoring Beijing's determination to back up its sovereignty claims with force if needed.

headline.main: Local Mexico Mayor, Policeman Arrested Over Alleged Murder of 10
headline.print_headline: Local Mexico Mayor, Policeman Arrested Over Alleged Murder of 10

docs.snippet: A local mayor and a police officer were among those arrested on Monday for their alleged involvement in the murder of 10 people in western Mexico, state prosecutors said....
docs.lead_paragraph: A local mayor and a police officer were among those arrested on Monday for their alleged involvement in the murder of 10 people in western Mexico, state prosecutors said.

headline.main: China Proposes Tightening Grip on NGOs
headline.print_headline: China Proposes Tightening Grip on NGOs

docs.snippet: China is proposing a further tightening of regulations on non-governmental organizations (NGOs), including demanding that they publicize specific information like funding and membership or face being banned....
docs.lead_paragraph: China is proposing a further tightening of regulations on non-governmental organizations (NGOs), including demanding that they publicize specific information like funding and membership or face being banned.

headline.main: After Trading Stars, Spunky Yanks Rally Past Mets 6-5 in 10
headline.print_headline: After Trading Stars, Spunky Yanks Rally Past Mets 6-5 in 10

docs.snippet: Dellin Betances, Didi Gregorius and the rest of the diminished New York Yankees hardly resembled a team resigned to quietly fading away this summer....
docs.lead_paragraph: Dellin Betances, Didi Gregorius and the rest of the diminished New York Yankees hardly resembled a team resigned to quietly fading away this summer.

headline.main: In-Flight Beer a Rare Treat for Nepali Migrant Workers Leaving Vulnerable Families Behind
headline.print_headline: In-Flight Beer a Rare Treat for Nepali Migrant Workers Leaving Vulnerable Families Behind

docs.snippet: For Nabin Lama, leaving Nepal after his annual home leave to return to his construction job in Saudi Arabia is not easy. What makes the journey bearable - even enjoyable - is the can of beer he can drink on the flight from Kathmandu....
docs.lead_paragraph: For Nabin Lama, leaving Nepal after his annual home leave to return to his construction job in Saudi Arabia is not easy. What makes the journey bearable - even enjoyable - is the can of beer he can drink on the flight from Kathmandu.

headline.main: Hendricks Pitches 7-Hitter as Cubs Beat Marlins 5-0
headline.print_headline: Hendricks Pitches 7-Hitter as Cubs Beat Marlins 5-0

docs.snippet: Jon Lester sought out Kyle Hendricks in the clubhouse, telling him the only thing that would have made his night better was if he had hit a solo homer for the game's only run....
docs.lead_paragraph: Jon Lester sought out Kyle Hendricks in the clubhouse, telling him the only thing that would have made his night better was if he had hit a solo homer for the game's only run.

headline.main: New Zealand Man Gets Payout After Spending 12 Years in Jail
headline.print_headline: New Zealand Man Gets Payout After Spending 12 Years in Jail

docs.snippet: The New Zealand government on Tuesday agreed to pay more than half a million dollars to a man who spent 12 years in jail after he was convicted of killing five members of his own family but was later found not guilty at a retrial....
docs.lead_paragraph: The New Zealand government on Tuesday agreed to pay more than half a million dollars to a man who spent 12 years in jail after he was convicted of killing five members of his own family but was later found not guilty at a retrial.

headline.main: Chinese Human Rights Activist Gets Suspended Sentence
headline.print_headline: Chinese Human Rights Activist Gets Suspended Sentence

docs.snippet: A Chinese court issued a suspended three-year prison sentence to a human rights activist charged with subversion of state power after a brief trial Tuesday, the first publicly acknowledged hearing in a secrecy-shrouded yearlong case involving hund...
docs.lead_paragraph: A Chinese court issued a suspended three-year prison sentence to a human rights activist charged with subversion of state power after a brief trial Tuesday, the first publicly acknowledged hearing in a secrecy-shrouded yearlong case involving hundreds of rights activists.

headline.main: Japan Defense Papers Raises Concerns About China, NKorea
headline.print_headline: Japan Defense Papers Raises Concerns About China, NKorea

docs.snippet: Japan called North Korea's nuclear and missile development a "grave and imminent threat" to the region and international security, and criticized China's increasingly assertive military action as "dangerous" in its annual defense report....
docs.lead_paragraph: Japan called North Korea's nuclear and missile development a "grave and imminent threat" to the region and international security, and criticized China's increasingly assertive military action as "dangerous" in its annual defense report.
